price: ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ ߓߍ߲߬ߢߐ߲߰ߦߊ ߞߊ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ ߟߋ߫ ߕߍ߰ߟߊ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
